Export to HTML

Settings

Adjust the amount of vertical graphic in each individual graphic file.

On the Edit menu, select Edit GEO Settings. The Registry Editor will open.

On the General tab, change the Band Height in Pixels for Export as HTML Image.

Click Apply, then OK.

You will need to save and restart GEO to implement any changes made.

Export plot to HTML

On the Depth tab, enter the Index Range you wish to export in From and To.

On the Export tab, select HTML Using... then choose your preferred image format.

An Export To dialog box will open. Enter a File name and the directory where it is going to be stored.

Click Save.

Back Forward
